entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Moosomin
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:30 PM CST Saturday 14 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -4.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Broadview 01:00 AM CST Sunday 15 January 2023
Temperature: -4.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.1 kPa falling
Humidity: 93 %
Wind Chill: -6
Dewpoint: -5.8°C
Wind: ESE 3 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday night: Freezing rain or snow. Temperature rising to minus 4 by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Freezing rain beginning early this evening and ending overnight then 60 percent chance of light snow. Fog patches developing this evening. Wind becoming west 20 km/h near midnight. Temperature rising to minus 4 by morning. Wind chill minus 12 this evening and minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 14 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of light snow. High minus 3 with temperature falling to minus 7 in the afternoon. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of light snow. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h in the morning. High minus 3 with temperature falling to minus 7 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 7 in the morning and minus 13 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 14 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Cloudy. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 9. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 14 January 2023
